activities: Noramco, Inc. processes employee personal information through its access to the global corporate HR system inventory that contains employee data from the EU/EEA and Switzerland and is housed in the United States. The global corporate system inventory is used by operating companies within the corporation to carry out Human Resource functions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) Panel and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
